titles.title: Directing the Secretary of the Senate to make a correction in the enrollment of the bill S. 612.
Directing the Secretary of the Senate to make a correction in the enrollment of the bill S. 612.

action.text: Mr. Shuster asked unanimous consent to consider as introduced.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Directs the Secretary of the Senate to make a correction in the enrollment of S. 612 to change the title to read "An Act to provide for improvements to the rivers and harbors of the United States, to provide for the conservation and development of water and related resources, and for other purposes."
